item.text: Ar+ya ma hApa ri nang tshan ma su
dbod skad du/ 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'des pe
chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo/// bam po thog ma'o// sas
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
tshul
gnyis myung tsa
kyis yongs su bskongs nas/ mdun du bdar te thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpyid zla 'bring
po'i tshes bco lnga'i nyin par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar go shegs su nye ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ban gyi rlabs
kyi gsung chen pos/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du kun du khyab par sems can thams cud la so so'i skad du/ gsung 'daskad ces
grags par gyur to// deng de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skya bo rnams la thugs brtsa ba/sems can
skyabs dang mgon du gyur pa/sems can thams cad la sras sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar mnyam par gzigs pa/sems can gyi
bku@#// skyabs dang/ dgung gnyen dang/ rten dang gnas su gyur pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o// so so'i skye bo dag the tshom dang som
pa byung yod/ de bas sku gdan gsal/ kham gyi sa mig gsal ba dang/ dkar dang/
lta bu s stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du yongs su snang bar byas nas/ dudag na
gzhag lta bu stag brag gi sasan ngag bar yig gsum dang kha gsab bu'i 'phros pa'i masum 'a sha dang ru// ma'ags bum/

pa'i pha ma'agyur pa/ kyihud kye hud mya ngan las 'das sam zhes sbas nas/ bral mos lag dang brang la rdebs te cho ngo rdung ngo// kha cig ni las kyang rab tu 'dar zhing ba spu kun langs nas skad kyis brnyas
pa tsam du dus so// delin sa chen po dang/ ri dang rgya mtsho yang rab tu g.yos shing 'khrugs so// de nas sems kun de dag gcig la gnyig snga bsring nga mya ngan bsang ba'i phyi ltad
skad du/ kyi grogs po dgamya ngan ma byed par myur du rtsa mchog gi grong khyer skyes bu stobs po che 'byung ba'i gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yengs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar 'jig rten na bskal pa ga gas/ bska nga pa gcig 'grub kyi ba ra du bzhugs par gsol du
'dang ngo zhes sbas so// de la lan gcig/galag pa la gcig gis 'jus nas 'di skad du/ 'jig rten stongs te sems can gyi bsod nams zad pas/ mi dge ba'i las 'jig rten
du 'byang ba'agyur gyis grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa na'ang porae phegs par yongasasu mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs nges kyis bdag cag myur du 'dang ngo zhes smano/
la la ni 'di skad du 'jig rten stongs so// 'jig rten stongs so/ bdag cag la deng slan chad ni mgon dang skyabs tshad de dbul 'phongs par gyur to// dang kho nar bla na med pa'i bcom ldan
da'adus dang yongs su bral las/ da slan chad spertsom dang som lha sba ba su la zhu zhes smra'o// de'i tshe na tshad med b.lenye gnas chen ba tsho dang ldan pa/
ka ya na chen po dang/ tshodang ldan pa ba ku la dang/ tshe dang ldan pa bstan dga' bo la sogs pa dge slong chen po de dag kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis rig pas lus kun
'dar zhing ma bzod pa tsam du rab tu g.yos te/ sams kyang myos nas cho nges 'debs shing/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna rogs kyis non par gyur to/
de'i tshe gzhan yang dge slong brgya stong phrag brgya dacu snyad thams cad kyang dgra bcom ba/ sems kyi dbang du gyurapo/ bya ba byus pa/ nyon mongs pa yongs su sangs pa/ dbang
po thams cad rab tu dul ba/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ltar mthu chub/ stong ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa// phyis bdag gi don rab tu rnyed pa/ na dan gyi la ltamatsan dan
kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sang ga'i rgyal po ltar sang gis yongs su bskor// de lta bu'i tshad med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sras yang dag pa sha stag
go de dag kyang snga dro nya ma shar ma thag tu gnas nas phyung ste/ so shing 'cha' pa na sangs rgyus kyi 'od kyis re gnas / gcig la gcig 'di skadu/ grogs po dag myur du kha
lag khrus shig sa skyas so// de skad ces smras ma thag tu lus kyi ba spu kun langs nas/ lus la khyab par khrag gis rgyas pa nim tog pa la sha lta bur gyur te//
mig mchims gang nas sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang soms can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ thog pa chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid
la rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyi'i/ de bzhin u0f8b/ shegs pas thabs su dgongs te gsungs pa dag bstan pa'i phyir rnam pa sna tshogs sa chos ston pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ sems
can thams cad yongs su gdul ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gyur du dong nas/ spyi bos sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ti/ lan brgya stong du bskor nas//
thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshog zhan yang ku ta la'i bu mo dag song ma dpal bzangs dang/ dge slong ma bstan dga' ma dang/ dge slong ma rgya
mtsho'i blo gros la sogs to/ dge slong ma khri phrag drug cu snyad thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ sems kyi dbang du gyur pa// bya ba byas pa da nyon mongs pa
yongs su stangs pa// dbang po rab tu dul ba/ klu chen po ltar gzi brjid rab tu che ba/ stong pa nyid kyi shes rab dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang snga dro'i dus kyi cho nya ma thog ma
shar ba na lus kyi ba spu kun skye bung zhes byed nas/ lus la khyab pas khrag gis rgyas pa na ma rtog pa la zha lta bu gyur te/ mig mchi mas yongs su gang nas
sdug bsngal chen po spyod par gyur to// de dag kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ theg pa chen po' don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de
bzhani/ shags pas thabs su dgongs te gsungs pa dag bstan pa'i phyir/ rnam pa sna tshogs su chos ston pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ soms can thams cad yongs su gdul ba'i phyir/
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der myur du dong nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du bskor nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
dge slong ma de dag gi nang na dge slong ma khag ni byang chub sems dpa' ste/ ma'i nang na klu lta bu s bcu rab tu non pa// mi g.yo ba la gnas pa/ sems can gdul ba'i phyir bud
med kyi lus ston kyang rtag tu tshad mad pa bzhi la nan tan byed pa/ sems kyi dbang du gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi skur yang sprul pa sha stag go/ de'i tshe gzhan yang krung
gad gcig gi bye ma snyad kyi byang chub sems dba' sams dpa' chen po'i mi'i nang na klu lta bu s bcu rab tunon pa mi g.yo ba la rab tu gnas pa/ thabs kyis lus ston pa sha stag la/
'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dpal dang/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la sogs te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis thog mar drangs
nas thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la bkur sti byed pa theg pa chen po la rab tu gnas pa/ theg pa chen po la shin tu mkhas pa// theg pa chen po la shin tu mos pa/ theg pa
chen po la shin tu srung ba/ 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyisams dang sbyor ba/ ma 'ongs ba'i dus su ma grol ba spel bar yi dam 'cha' pa/ 'dus pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs
ma pa'i bar du tshul khrims yongs su bsrungs pa// spyod pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ ma grel ba grol bar byed pa 1 dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'tshob pa/ ma
'os pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo skorab 'gyurab/ rgyan chen pos shin tu brgyan pa/ de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang
'dra bar lta ba sha stag go/ de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma shar ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg ma thag tu lus kyi ba spu kun las te/ lus la khyab par khrag gis rgyas pa ni ji
ltar ma tog pa la sha lta bur gyur to// mig lamims yongs su gang nas sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to// de dag kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyur theg pa chen/
po don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas thabs su dgongs te gsungs pa bstan pa'i phyir/ rnam pa sna tshogs su
chos ston pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad yongs su gdul ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der myur du dong nas phyin pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la
spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas lan brgya stong du bskor te/ thal mo spyar nas bsti stang dang bcas pas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA gnyis kyi
bya ma snyad kyi dge bsnyan pa khrims lnga yongs su bsrang pa la/ 'ang lta ste/ dwage bsAn gzi brjid dra ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po dang/ dge bsnyan legs ba'i yon tan la
sogs pas thog mar drangs te/ thams cad kyang gnyan por gyur pa'i chos la shin Tu mos pa ni/ 'di lta sta/ sdug bsngal dang/ bde ba dang/ rtag pa dang/ ma
rtag pa dang/ yongs su dag pa dang/ ma dag pa dang/ bdag dang/ bdag med pa dang/ nges pa dang/ ma ngos pa dang/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ skyabs su mi 'gro
ba dang/ sems can dang/ soms can ma yin pa dang/ thor phrug dang/ ther zug ma yan pa dang// bde ba dang bde ba ma yin pa dang// 'dus byas dang//
'dus ma byas dang/ chad pa dang/ chad pa ma yin pa dang/ mya ngan las 'da' ba dang/ mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin pa dang/ lhag ma dang/ lhag ma ma yin pa la sogs to/gnyen por 'gyur

ba'i chos 'di dag la rtog pas shin tu mos pa sha stag go/ gzhan yang bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la thos par mos pa ji ltar thos pa bzhin du gzhan la yang ston nus pa// tshul khrims longs su srung ba/
thog pa chen po la skom pas gdungs pa ltar mos pa// bdag kyang shin tu ngoms la/ skom pas gdungs pa gzhan yang ngom par byed pa/ bla na med pa'i ya shes la shin tu'ajug pa/ theg pa chen po
la mos pa/ theg pa chen po la shin tu srung ba/ 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi sems dang shin tu sbyor ba/ ma brgal ba sgrol ba/ ma grol pa 'grel pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par
'tshob ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo shan tubaskor ba/ rgyan chen pos rnam par brgyan pa/ soms shin tu zab mo'i de pha mas ba tshul khrims yongs su rtog pa thams cad kyang de lta bu'i
yon tan dang ldan ba/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen por sams bskyod cing/ bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar gnyis su med par snyoms pa sha stag go/ de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyim
shar ma thag tu 'od zer gyis reg nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpung zhugs la bzhin pa'i phyir/ thams cad kyis so so nas spros kyi snying khri phrag du ma bshams pa la/ 'ad lta ste/ sros kyi
shing tsan dan dang a ka ru dang/ 'go shar sha tsan dan dang/ lha'i shing bsung can la sogs pa'o// shing de dag kyang mdzes pa'i ri mo dang ldan zhing/ rin po che sna

bdun gyis rnam par brgyanab/ 'od shin tu 'tshar zhing gsal ba ni/ dper na ri mo mkhan gyis tshon sna tshogs bkye ba dang 'dra ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kha dog sngon po dang/ sa rapo dang/

dmar po dang/ dkar por ldan te/ 'gro ba mang po mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ba sha stag go/ shing rnam pa mang po de dag la gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sras kyi lde gu dang/ gur kum dang/ a ka ru dang
pog la sogs pas yongs su bskus la/ ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtor cing brgyan pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ ma tog ut+pal dang/ me tog ku mu da dang/ ma tog badro dang/ ma tog buNaDa ka la sogs

pa'o/ shing de dag la gzhan yang tshon rnam pa lda dang ldan pa'i ba dan shin tu 'jam zhing mdzes bas yongs su sbyangs pa ni/ dper na lha'i na bza' ke'u sha ya ram shu ma lta bu 'o// spos kyi shang de

dag kyang 'an bo che'i shing rtas bskyas te/ rnani bo ni'i shing rta de dag las kyang 'od rnam ba sna tshogs 'byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ sarapo dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po'o// shing rta'i

gnyalashing dang/ bar rdang la sogs pa dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyis rnam par spras te/ shing rta de re re yang rta bzhi bzhis drangs so// rta de dag kyang mgyogs khyad rlung dang 'dra'o// shing rta de re lo'i

mdun rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan lnga bcu snyadayang sate 2 gsar bya drapas bu der bris so// shing de re re'i stang yang rin po che'i gdugs lnga bcu snyad bres so// shing rta de re re la yang ma tog gi
'brang pa spyas pa ni/ 'di lta sta/ ma tog ut+pal dang/ me tog ku mu da dang 2 ma tog bad+mo dang/ pun da ra ka rnams te/ 'dab ma ni gsar/ ge sar ni rdo rjel byas te/ ma tog gi ge sar

dag gi nang na yang dung ba nag po lding zhing rtsa 'o// gzhan yang sgraskad shin tu snyan pa dang/ de ma yin pa mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong ba nyid dang/ bdag med pa'i sgra yang ra phyin to//
de dag las gzhan yang byang chupa sams dpa'i sngon gyur ba spyod pa'i sgra dang/ gzhan yang 'ol mo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra grags pa ni/ 'ad lta ste/ glu dang/ gar dang/ gling bu dang/ dgu po
rgyudangs dang/ so'u dang/ shir dang/ rnga'i sgra rnams so// rol mo'i sgra de las gzhan yang 'di skad du/ kyi hud kyicud 'jig rten stongs so zhes zer ba'i sgra yang byung ngo// shing rta de re re'i

mdun na dge bsnyan rin ba tshosna bzhi'i khri'u thogs pa re re yod de/ wi'u de'i stang na rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog spyas pa ni/ 'ad lta ste/ me tog uta la dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dang/ pun da
raka dang/ gur kum dang/ byug spos dang/ bdug spos la sogs pa mchog tu gyur/ yul du gyur pa rnams bshams so// dge bsnyen rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la bsod snyoms rnam
pa sna tshogs bshams pa yang/ thams cad tsad dan dang/ a ka ru shing bsung can ba srags te/ yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshulas g.yos su byas so// zhal zas de/
dag kyang ro rnam pa drug dang ldan no// 'di lta ste/ kha ba dang/ sgyur ba dang/ dngar bdad/ tsha ba dang/ lan tshwa bro pa dang/ bsngal ba'i 'o dang ldan no// gzhan yang yon tan rnam pa gsum dang
ldan te/ mnyen zhing mjam pa dang/ gtsang pa dang/ chos bzhin byas pa'o// de lta bu la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bshams nas/ stobs po cher byung ba'i gnas sA la'i shing
drung du lhags so// gzhan yang gsar gyi bye mas sa gzhi bdal te/ lha'i na bza' ka tsa lan da dang/ kham pa la dang/ dar gyis de'i stang du bting ba ni kho ra khor yug dpag tshad bcu gnyis
tshun chad yogs par byas so// sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun bzhugs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge 'i khri bshams te/ khri de dag kyang 'phang du mtho khyad ri rab lhun po dang mnyam mo// khri
de dag gi steng na rin po che'i gur phub nas/ doshal rnam pa mang bo spungs so// sa la'i shing de dag la yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ba dan sa ta/ gdugs bris nas rnam ba sna tshogs kyi
sos bsung can gyi lde gus shing de dag la bskus so// shing ga bar yong ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chal par bkang ngo// dge bsnyan do rnams so so nas yid la 'di snyams du soms so//
so so'i skye bo dag gal te bzor bas brel na bza' ba sbyin no// btung bas sbrel ba la btung ba/ mgo 'dod pa rnams la mgo/ mig 'a dod pa rnams la mig/ de ltar so so'i skye bo dag 'dod
pa bzhin du thams cad sbyin pa byin te// sbyin ba de yang 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang gti mug dang/ rnyog pa'i sems med do// de las gzhan pa 'jig rten khyi las spyod kyi phyol bsam
pa'isoms med kyi/ bla na med pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub 'ba' zhig gi phyira'o// dge bsnyan de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub la bde ba gnas nas yang 'di snyam du soms so// de bzhin
gshegs pa ni bdag cag gi mchod pa 'di bzhes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o snyam bsams nas/ de dag gi lus kyi ba spu kun las te/ lus khrag gis rgyas pa na mi rtog pa la
sha lta bur gyur/ mchims ni mig gang/ sdug bsngal chen pos ni gdungs par gyur te/ so so nas mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa sos kyi shing dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/
gdugs dang zhal zas kyi rnams rin po che'i shing rtas bskus nas/ sangs rgya sa gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dad sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mchod pa'i yo
byad bshams pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod de/ lan brgya stong du bskor nas skad phyung sta ngus so// ngu ba'i sgras gnam sa yang g.yos so// brang rdung zhing mo de 'debs te mchi
ma char bzhin du brag nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kyicud kyicud grogs bo dag 'jig rten stongs so 'jig rten stongs so zhes smras nas/ de bzhin gshegs
ba'ispyan sngar las brdabs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag cag gi mchod pa bshams pa nang gi tha ma 'di
bzhes shig ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung ste ma bzhes nas/ de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du gsol kyang bzhes su ma gnang ngo// dge bsnyan de dag
bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te cang mi smra bar 'khod pa ni/ drab r na pha ma shin tu byams pa'i bu gcig pa glo bur du nad kyis btab sta/ tshe 'phos
nas dur du bskyal te shin tu mya ngan gyis yid ba/dungs pa dang 'dra bar/ dge bsnyan du dgamya ngan gyis yid gdungs pa yang de dang 'dra sku/ mchod pa'i lo byad rnams gnas gcig tu
bzhag nas/ phyogs gcig tu cang mislu bar 'khod do// de'i tshe gzhan yang klung da gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi dag pasnyan ma khrims lnga yos su srung ba/ spyod pa las
dang ldan pa la/ 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyan ma 'tsho ba'i yon tan dang/ dge bsnyen ma dpal gyi 'phreng ba dang/ dge bsnyan ma phyi ba'izerasha ka la sogs pas thog mar drangs nas/ dge
bsnyan cha brgyad khri bzhi stong snyad thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa// sems can tshad med pa brgya stong gdul ba'i phyir bud med kyi lus su lkon cing/ khyim gyi chos yongs su smad
pa bdag gi lus la sprul gdug pa bzhi dang 'dra bar rtogs pa lus rtag tu srin bu grangs med pa thang dang lus 'di la shin tu patsog pa dang/ 'dod pas yongs su bcings par rtog
pa lus nad la khu ngodang 'dra bar 'jigs su rung ba dang/ lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste/ bu ga dgu nas rta0 tu zag par rtogs pa/ lus 'di ni mkhar dang 'dra ste/ sha dang/ pags
pa dang/ tsa dang/ rgyus pas rnam par dkris pa/ lag pa dang rkang pa ni mkhatsA spyi nyen lta bur gyur pa/ mig ni skar khung lta bur gyurang/ mgo bo na khang pa lta bur gyur te/ sems rgyal po dang
'dra ba de'i nang na gnas par rtogs pa/ lus mkhar dang 'dra ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su sngas te/ bus pa so so'i skye bo dag ni de la chags bar byed do//
'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi srin po gnas par rtogs pa// lus 'di ni snying po bopa ste/ 'dzam bu'i myu gu 'am/ e'an 'da' 'am/ chu bur ram/ chu shing lta
bur rtogs pas/ lus 'di ni mi rtag pa lta/ skad cig skad cig chu 'pho zhing/ dper na glog gi 'od dam gza' po'i chu 'am/ sgyu ma 'am/ smig rgyu 'am/ tshuka ri mor bris pa lta bur
bya// rtogs pa/ lus 'di ni 'gyur zhing 'pho ba ste/ dpar na chu 'gram g.yang sa'i sdong bo lta bur rtogs pa/ lus 'di ni ring po ra mi thogs ba ste/ spyang ki dang/ 'pharab
dang srin bya dang/ lug pa dang/ bya rgod dang lA dang/ spyaka dang/ khyi ltogs pa'i zan du gyur te/ 'di la mkhas pa shes can su zhig mos shing chags par byed snyam du rtogs pa/ bany+tsig
gi nang du rgya ma chen por chu blugs kyang bzod kyi/ lus 'di mi rtag pa dang/ mi gtsang pa dang/ btsog pa ni brjod sla ba ma yin par rtogs pa/ sa chen po 'di rgya shug tsam du dril te/ rgyud
dun yungs kar gyi 'bru 'am/ rdul phra mor gas ba ni sla'i/ lus 'di'i nyes pa'i skyon brjod pa ni sla ba ma yin par rtogs pa// de bas na mchil ma dang 'dra bar yongs su spangs nas/ dol
rgyu de'i rkyen gyis dge bsnyan ma rnams stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i chos la rtag tunan tan byed ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde nyan cing 'dzin pa la mos pa/ thos
nas kyang gzhan la rgyatshor ston nus pa/ sngon gyi smon lam yongs su 'dzin pa/ bud mad kyi lus la shin tu smod ba/ shin tu skyon che bsngashes pa/ snying po med par rtogs ba/ sams rtag tu
rnal 'byor du spyod pa/ de bzhin du yang dag bar rtogs shing mtha'amad par 'khor ba'i rgyan yongs su gcod pa/ theg pa chen po la skom pas gdungs pa ltar mos pa/ bdag shin tu ngoms
pas gzhan yang shin tu ngoms par byed pa/ theg pa chen po la 'ab tu mos pa/ theg pa chen po shin tu srung ba/ bud med kyi lus su ston kyang yang dag bar byang chub sems dpa' sha stag ste/
thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi bsam pa dang shin tu sbyar ba/ ma brgal ba sgrol ba/ ma grol pa 'khrol pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par natsob pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su
chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'agyu ba/ rgyan chen pos yongs su brgyan pa/ tshul khrims los su srung ba/ de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sams
bskyad cing/ bu gcig dang 'dra bar gnyis su med par mnyam pa shastag go/ de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma thog ma shar ba na/ 'od kyis reg nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ dang ni shing sa la
drung gnyis kyi drung du 'dong ngo zhes sbas so// dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis mchod ba'i yo byad bshams pa snga ma bas phyad kyis bzang bar sbyar te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong skor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun du
bcas pa la mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes shig ces gsol to// de la bcom ldan 'dras cang ma gsang par bazhes sa ma gnang
ngo dge bsnyen ma rnams bsams ba bzhin ma gyur pa// mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA bzhi'i
bye ma snyad kyi la tsa phyi'i su/ grong khyer yangs pa can na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang/ bud mad dad khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ chung ma dang/ 'khor rnams dang/ gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi
rgyal rigs su gtogs pa/ rgyal po'i 'khor dang bcas te thams cad kyang chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims yongs su srung pa/ spyod lam dang ldan pa/ slob pa gzhal zhugs shing dam
pa'i chos la sun 'byin pa// shin tu tshar gcod pa sha stag gcig la gcig 'di skad ces dam 'cha' 'od/ bdag cag gsar dang/ dngul dang/ rin po che'i gteramadzod lta bur yang dag pa'i
chos shin tu zab mo bdud rtsi lta bu zad mi shes pa/ yun du 'jig rten na gnas bar byas to/ bdag cag kyang de dag la rtag tunan tan spyod par gyur cig/ gal te zhal nas gsungs pa'i dam
pa'i chos la dbang zhing skur ba zhig yodan/ bdagacag gis de'i lce gcad do zhes dam bcas shing/ gzhan yang khyim nas khyim ma yin bar 'ab tu byung ba dag tshul khrims las nyams par gyur
na bdag cag gis khyim pa' phab ste/ las byed du gzhug go zhes pa dang/ gal te dam pa'i chos la nan tan du byed na/ bdag cag gis pha ma dang 'dra bar ma gro dang bkur sti bya'o zhes pa/
dang/ gal te dge 'dun las dam pa'i chos la nan ton du spyod pa zhig yod na/ bdag cag gis rjes su yi rang zhing de la ma yang sbyin par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa/ rtag tu thag bachen po'i mdo sde/
thos bar mos shing/ thos nas kyang gzhan la rgyas par ston ba de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan ba sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ li tsa bya'i bu rnam dag dri ma med pa'i snying bo dang/ li tsa byi'i bu bag
yod pa rnam par dag pa dang/ li tsa byi'i bu rtag tu dri med rnam dag yon tan la sogs te/ de dag gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kye grogs po dag myur bar de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der

song sta/ mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod du 'deng ngo// de nas li tsa bya de dga' 'os kyang bal glang brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ rin po cha'i shing rta rta bzhi la bcas pa
brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ gzhan yang shing tsan dan dang/ a ka ru spams pa brgyad khri bzhi stong snyad bshams te/ bal gling de ra ra'i
mdun na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ gdugs kyang bshams so// gdugs nang gi chung du yang kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig khopas so// ba dan nang ga chung ngu yang ring
khyad dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis so// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan nang gi chung du yang mtho khyad dpag tshad brgya pa ste/ de lta bu'i mchod ba'i yo byad bshams nas/ sas rgyas gang na bar lhags
te phyin pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas lan brgya stong du bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa'i yo byad 'di dag dbul na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ mchod pa 'di dag
bzhes shig ces gsol to// de la de bzhin gshegs pa cang ma gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo// lo tsa phyi'i bu rnams bsams ba bzhin du mgyur nas shin tu mya ngan gyis non te/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sa las shing rta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags nas/ steng gi nam mkha' la cang mi sla bar 'khod do// de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA/
lnga'i phye ma snyad kyi blon po chen bo dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon theg pa chen po la shin tu mos bas/ slob pa gzhan la zhugs ba gang zhig yang dag pa'i chos la sman pa zhig yod na/ de
dag gi mthus thulapa ni/ ji ltar rtsa ba dang shing la sa ba bab pa lta bu stag la/ 'di lta sta/ tshong dbon nyi ma'i 'od dang/ tshong dpon 'jig rten skyong dang/ tshong dpon chos skyong la sogs
pas thog mar drangs to/ de dag gis so so nas mchod pa'i yo byad bshams ba ni snga ma bas lnga 'gyuratsam ba shems te/ shing sa la drung gnyis kyi bar gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces kha yo ka' to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang dag slong gi
dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa'i yo byad 'di dag 'bul nabazhes shig ces gsol to// de la de bzhin gshegs pas cang mi gsung nas bshes su ma gnang ngo// tshong dpon de dag bsams pa bzhin du
ma gyur nas shin tu mya ngan gyis yid gdungs par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyin gyi rlabs kyis/ sa las shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas/ steng gi nam mkha' la cang mi smra bar 'khod
da'i tshog zhan yang yul yangs pa can kyi rgyal po btsun mo dang sras su bcas/ gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling na rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma gtogs par/ rgyal phran de ma yin pa
thams cad dang/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs dang/ grong 'dab thams cad kyi mi thams cad dang bcas pa la/ 'di lta sta/ rgyal po zla 'od dri med rgyal po la sogs pas thog mar drangs nas
so so nas dmag rnam bzhi dang bcas te/ sangs rgyas gang na pas lcags so// rgyal po de dag re re yang 'khor khri phrag pargyad cu dang bcas so// dmag gi tshogs kyang bal gling dang rta pa ste//
bal gang de dag kyang mche ba drug dang ldan la/ rta rnams kyang mgyogs khyad rlung bzhin te/ mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa yang snga ma bas drug 'gyur gyis lhag go/ rin po che'i gdugs nang
dge chung du yang chu zheng kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad brgyad khebs so// ba dan nang gi chung du yang ring khyad dpag tshad bcu drug snyad do// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan nang
gi chung du yang mtho khyad dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug go/ rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i chos la gnas pas log pa'i chos kun la shin tu spyod pa/ theg pa chen po la bkur ste
byed pa/ theg pa chen po la shin tu mos pa/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig dang 'dra bar byams pa/ zhal zas bshams pa'i dri yang dpag tshod bzhi'i bar du bya ba bshams nas/
snga dro'i dus kyatsho mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thogs te/ shing sA la drung gnyis kyi bar de bzhin gshegs pa gangan bzhugs pa der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sas rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa 'di dag 'dul na/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag cag
gi mchod pa tha ma 'di bzhes shigaces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas bzhes su ma gnang ngo// rgyal po de dag kyang bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas/ shin tu mya ngan gyis yid
gdungs par gyur te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshog zhan yang klung gang+gA padun gyi bye ma snyad kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams tshogs te/ de la gcig ma gtogs pa ni ma skyes dpa'i
btsun mo 'ba' zhig go/ sems can gdul ba'i phyir bud med kyi lus su ston te/ rtag tu lus kyis nan tan du spyod cing/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i chos la sems dris/
shingegoms pa'i byed pa de la sogs te/ btsun mo khams gsum pazang po dang/ btsun mo 'dod pa'i yon tan la sogs pas thog mar drangs so// thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos la bas shing tshul/
wims yongs su srung ba/ spyod lam dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar khyoms pa sha stag go/ de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ bdag cag kyang myur bar sangs rgyas
gang na bzhugs par 'dong ngo zhes smras so// rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams kyis mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa ni snga ma bas bdun 'gyur gyis lhag ste/ me tog dang/ spos dang/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan
dang dar gyi ba dan dang/ gdugs dang/ zhal sras mchog rnams so// rin po che'i gdugs nang gi chung ngu lang chu zheng kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad bcu drug khebs so// ba dan nang gi chung ngu'i

tshad kyang dpag tshadasum cu rtsa drug snyad do// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan nang gi dma' ba'i tshad kyang dpag tshad drug cu rtsa brgyad snyad do// zhal zas kyi dri bsung gis kyang dpag tshad brgyad kyi bar du blo ba/
mchod pa'i yo byang de lta bu dag bshams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba derasong ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du ma bskor te/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa'i yo byad bshams te 'bul ba/
'di de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i sad du/ mchod pa nang gi pha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung nas bzhes
su ma gnang ngo/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas/ shin tu mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te sku 'bal zhing/ brang la thal mos rdebs te/ cho nges rdung ba ni ya/
ltar burinang na sdug pa shi ba dang 'dra bar gyur nas/ phyogs gcig tu cang mi sla bar 'khod do// de'i tshaklung ga brgyad kyi bye ma snyad kyi lha'i bu mo rnams la/ 'di lta ste/
lha'i bu mo yangs pa'i mig ces bya bas thog ma drangs te 'di skad ces smras so// kye grogs mo dag mthong ngam ltos shig/ 'khor gyi dkyil la khor mang pos mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna
tshogs bshams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul ba mthong ngam/ bdag cag kyang mchod pa'i yo byad bshams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nas/
de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes pa'i 'og tu mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o// kye grogs mo dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du gshegs pa yang shin
tu dka'/ mchod pa nang gi tha ma bshams te 'bul ba yang shin tu dka'o// gal te bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das na 'jig rten stongs par 'gyupa'o zhes smras so// lha'i bu mo de rnams kyang thog
pa chen po 'dod pa/ theg pa chen po thos par mos ba/ thos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher ston nus pa theg pa chen po la skom pas gdungs pa ltar gyur cing/ bdag shin tu ngoms par byed pa//
skom pas gdungs ba gzhan dag kyang ngoms par byed pa/ theg pa chen po la skyob pa/ slob pa gzhan la zhugs pa dag theg pa chen po la sun 'byin cing phrag dog byed pa yod na/ ji ltar myu las ba/
bab pa bzhin du shin tu phul ba/ tshul khrims yongs su srung ba/spyod lam dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi yid dang sbyor ba la shin tumakhas pa/ ma dul pa rnams 'dul ba/ ma grol ba
rnams grol bar byed pa/ phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshob pa/ theg pa chen po lanan tan byed cing/ rgyas chen pos shAn

brgyan pa/ de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la yang bu gcig pa dang 'dra ba'i byams pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyam thog ma shar ba na/ so so nas rnam pa sna
tshogs lha'i shari bsung can bshams pa ni/ ma'i shing bsrung can las khyad par du gyur pa shing gi bsung des/ mi'i 'jig rtenan mnam zhing dri mi zhim pa thams cad zhi bar byed la/ shing rta dkar pa
la gdugs dkar po 'phros te/ rta dkar bo bzhis drangs pa/ shing ltade'i u0f7a'i stong yang gur dkarapo phub pa la/ yul gyi mtha'am yang gsar gyi dril bu spras ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi

sngos dang/ ma tog dang/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang/ ba danadang/ gdugs dang/ zhal zas mchog dam pa dang/ rol rnam ba snatshog basham te/sang ke'i gan btang ngo// sang ge'i gdan gyi rkang pa bzhi yang pit+tam thon mthing

las byas pa/ de'i rgyab na rin po che sna bdun gyi ma rten dang bcas pa la/ mdun yung gsar las byas pa'i sngas sde re yod pa/ rin po tshes bdun gyi sgron ma'i sdong po la no 'bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgron
ma snang ba/ sa gzhi thams cad lha'im tog gis chal par bkod pa de lta bu dag lha'i bu mo de dag gis bshams nas/ yid gdungs shing mchim khrag sna sdug bsngal chen po skyes kyang/ sems can thams cad

la ban ba dang bde ba'i phyir/ theg pa chen po don dam pa stong ba nyid dang ldan par bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pas dgos te gsungs pa mngon du bstan pa dang/ chos rnam pa sna tshogs sna brgyun mi gcad
ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du ma bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das bdag ca ga la thugs brtse pa'i slad du/ mchod pa bshams pa'i nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo//
0 lha'i bu mo rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs tacang mi sla ba'i phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshog zhan yang klung gang+gA da'i bye ma snyad kyi klu'i rgyal po
phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa la/ 'ad lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po bsnyen dga' bo la sogs pas thog mar drangs nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang snga dro'i
dus nya ma thog mar shar ba na/ lha dang mi las lhag pa re mchod pa 'i yo byad bshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya
stong du ma bskor to/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ mchod pa'i nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs
ba dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo// de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang bsams ba bzhin du ma gyur pas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i

tshog zhan yang klung gang+gA bcu'i bye ma snyad kyi gnod sbyin gyi rgyal bo ngal bso po la sogs pas thog mar dras nas/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu dga myur bar sangs rgyas gang na bder 'dong ngo zhes
smras nas/ mchod pa'i yo byang klu bas lhag par bshams te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du ma bskor nas/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse pa'i smad dumachod pa bshams pa'i nang gi ca ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to// de la bcom ldan 'das
cang mi gsung bas bzhes su ma gnang ngo// gnod spyin gyi rgyal po rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur bas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i phyogazhan lang kyang da

nyi shu'i bye ma snyad kyi nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po pas rgol ba bcom ba zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang+gA sum cu'i byi ba snyad kyi dra ba'i rgyal po mthu bo ches thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang

klung gang+gA bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi ma 'am su'i rgyal po shin tu mthong ba zhes bya bas thog ma drungs so// gzhan yang klung gang+gA lnga bcu'i bye ma snyad kyi lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po shin tu mthong ba chen po zhes

bas thog ma'angs so// gzhan yang klung gang+gA drug cu bya ma snyadakyilha ma yin gyi rgyal po kham pa las thog mar drangs so// kazhan yang klung gang bdun cu'i bye ma snyad kyi tan pa'i rgyal po dri med

'bab chu dang/ ba tid talasogs pas thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang+gA brgyad cu'i bye ma snyad kyi srin po'i rgyal po 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so// de dag kyang sdig pa
ma dag bsams los su spangs nas mi la ma za ba dang/ dgra dang khon du gyur pa la byams shing snying rje'i sems skyo ba dang/ gzugs mi sdug pa yang sas rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thams cad
blta/ bzang zhing sdug par gyur to//gzhan yang klung gang+gA dgu bcu'i bye ma snyad kyi nags tshal la dbang ba'i lha dri bsung la dga' ba zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang+gA

stong gi bye ma snyad kyi 'ga'adzin gyi rgyal po rdzu 'phrul chen po zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyi mdangs bra ba'i rgyal bo shin tu mthong zhes bya bas thog ma
drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang+gA khri phrag brgya'i bye ma snyadakyi lha'i bu mo 'dod chags can lam pa dang/ u pa sha dad/ ma tote la tsam dang/ phyi sha ka la sogs bas thog mar drangs so//

gzhan yang klung gang+gA/wa phrug stong gi bya bsnyad kyi sa la gnas pa'i yi dgas kyi rgyal po gzhog dkar zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so// gzhan yang klung gang+gA la bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyad kyi lha'i
sras po rnams dang/ lha'i rgyal po la phyogs bzhi'i mgon pos thog mar drangasaso// gzhan yang klung gang+gA 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyad kyi rlung gi lhas na phyogs bzhi nas sa las skyes pa'i ma

tog dus dang dus ma yin pa rnams sA la'i shing drung du chal par bkang ngo// gzhan yang klung gang+gA 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyad kyi rlung dang char la dbang ba'i lha rnams na radi snyam du/ bdag cag
gis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas zhugs la bzhin pa na char rab tu phab stadus su mi sha bar bya ba dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor las tshabs gdungs pa rnams kyang shin tubasil
bar bya'o snyam du sems so// gzhan yang klung gang+ganyi shu'i bya bsnyad kyi spos kyi bal glang chen po bal gling gi rgyal po la bu dang/ bal gling gi rgyal po gsal
can dang/ bal gling gi rgyal bo dngar ba'i dang/ b.laglang gi rgyal po mthon mthing mig dang/ bal glang ga rgyal po bsung can la sogs pas thog mar drangs te/ de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen

po'akhaste stang byed pa/ thog ba chen po la mos pa sha stag sta/ de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ring por mi thogs par mya ngan las 'da' bar shes pas/ so so nas pad+mo bzang po tshang mad pa
dpag tu med pa byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags nas/ gdong gis phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu sdod do// gzhan yang klung gang+ga nyi shul phye ma snyed kyi/ pe
dgas kyi rgyal sang gi seng ge sgra zhes bya bas thog mar drangs te/ sems can thams cad la 'jigs ba byas nas/ so so nas me tog dang 'bras bu thogs te/ sa sa rgyus gang na bar lcags nas//
sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'atsal te/ phyogs gcig tu sdod do// gzhan yang klung gang+gAnyi shu'i bye ma snyad kyi bya'i rgyal po ngang pa dang/ dur pa dang/ rma bya dang/ 'gen dar ba
dang / ka lan ta dang/ gu thog dang/ ne tso dang/ ko ki la dang/ ba hi ka dang/ ka la ping ka dang/ 'tsho byed 'tsho byed la sogs pa/ bya'i rgyal po rnams kyang so so nas me tog dang 'bras bu thebs
te sas rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu sdod do// gzhan yang klung gang+gA ste shu'i bye ma snyed kyi chu glang dang/ ga
dang lug la sogs pa// sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ grong khyer rtswa mchog gi 'obs dang shang shong thams cad kyang dribasung dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ro bro bar ldan pa'i 'o mas kun tu ga
bar byas nas phyogs gcig tu sdod do// gzhan yang klung gang+gA nyi shu'i bye ma snyad kyi gling bzhi la gnas pa'i drang srong bzod pa can zhes bya pa la sogs pas thog mar drangs te so
so nas mo tog dang/ spos dang/ 'bras bu dngar la sogs pa thogs te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum
bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs partsa ba'i slad du/ mchod pa nang gi bla ma 'di pezhes shika nyes gsol to// de bzhin/
gshegs pa dusamkhyen pas cang mi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang nas/ drang srong gi rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/
da'adzam bu gling ga bung ba'irgyal po sgra snyan ces bya bas thog mar drangs nas/ bung ba thams cad kyang ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs thogs te/ sas rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lan cig bskol nas phyogs gcig tu sdod do// de'i 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i dge slong dang dag srung ma thams cad 'dus
ta de la gnyis ma gtogs pa na 'od srungs chen po dang dga' bo'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa klung gang+ga'i bye ma snyad dang/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ri la sogs

ba'i rab ra'i rgyal pos thog mar drangs te/ med dag thams cad kyang pashin tubargyan pa ni nags tshal rgyas pa dang/ shing rnams kyi lo ma dang/ yal ga yang nan par nyi ma'i 'od chod pa dang/ ma tog rnam pa

sna tshogs rgyas pa dang/ kho ra khor yug tu rab chudang/ chu mig longs su dag cing pasung dang ldan pa dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri pho dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci

dang lto 'phya chen po rang/ rig 'dzin dang/ drang srong la sogs pas rol mo rnam pa snatshogs byed pas yos su gang bar gyur to// lha dang drang srong de dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags te/ sas
rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang gras med pa'i klung gang+gA'abyamasnyad kyirgya mtsho bzhi'i lha dang/ 'bab chu kun gyi lta gzi brjid chen po dang

ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyang/ snga ma bas lhag par mchod pa 'i yo byad pashams te/ lha rnams kyi lus kyi 'od dang/ rol mo'i cha byad dang/ ma mar gyis nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi snang bar byas nas/ ma rtog
tsam bkas klungaha rilapa ta legs su gtor te/ sangs rgyas ba dang na bar lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tsha te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tsha grong khyer rtswa mchog/sha

sAla'i tshal thams cad kyang skya bor gyur te// stong ginam mkha' la rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang 'buladang ra mor ldan pa/ rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras

partagazhal med khang gi drung na chumag dang/ rdzing bu dang mtsha' las me tog pad+mo skyes pa ni/ byang gi sgra snyan nam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi spyod mos tshal shin tu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang 'dra par rang byung

bar gyur to// de'i tshon shing sA la'i tshal kun tu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing ga tu yid du 'ong bar gyur to// de'i tshe lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yis
su myu ngan las 'da' ba'i ltas yin par rig nas/ thams cad mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te mi dga' bar gyur to// de'i nga rgyal chen bzhi'i rgyal bo dang/ brgya byin lha dbang phyug dag gcig la
gcig 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu dag 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin la sogs pa mchod pa bshams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa la ltos/bdag cag kyang de bzhin/

mchod pa bya'o// gal te bdag cag gis nang gi tha mar mchod na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur du nges so zhes smras so// de nas rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa snga ma
bas shin tu lhag par bashams pa la/ 'di lta ste/ ma tog man da ra ba dang/ man da ra ba chen po dang/ ma rtog ka phyi ka dang/ ka tsa li ka chen po dang/ ma tog man 'dzusha ka dang/

man 'dzu sha ka chen po dang/ ma tog san tan ka dang/ san ta na ka chen po dang/ ma tog yid du 'ong ba dang/ yid du 'ong pa chen po dang/ ma rtog kun tu bzang po dang/ kun tu bzang bo chen po dang/ ma tog dus
can dang dus can chen bo dang/ me tog bsung gi grong khyer dang/ bsung gi grong khyer chen po dang/ ma tog rab tu dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba chen po dang/ ma tog 'dod ldan dang/ 'dod ldan chen po
dang ma tog gsung chos dang/ bsang mos chen po dang/ ma rtog kun tu bsung dang/ kun tu bsung chen po dang/ me tog lhaligs ra 'dab dang/ ma tog klu zhes bya ba dang/ shing pa ra tsi tra'i ma
tog dang/ shing ko ba du ma'i me tog dang/ gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zhal zas ro bro ba dang ldan pa thogs te sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyug/
katshal te/ lha rnams kyi 'od kyis nyi zla'i 'od kyang zil gyis gnon to// mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bshams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang
mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo// de'i tshe lha rnams kyang bsams ba bzhin du ma gyur pas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcitsheg tu 'khod do/ de'i tshabargya byin lha'i
dbang phyug dang sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha rnams kyis snga ma bas shin tu lhag pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad bshams nas/ ma tog thogs pa'i ng snga ma dang 'dra ste/ dri bsung gis shin tu mngad pa/
ni yid du 'ong sta/ gzhal med khang rgyal bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba dang/ gzhal med khang chung ngu rnams bshams te/ sas kyis gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi
bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni theg pa chen po la shin tu dad cing chos na/ de bzhin gshegs pa padag cag la thugs brtse ba'i
slad du/ mchod pa 'di dag bzhes shig ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'a das dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo// de nas brgya byin dang/ lha'i 'khor rnams bsams pa
bzhin du ma gyur nas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'dod pa khams kyi gnam rim pa drug gi bar du mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa ni/ 'ani
po che'i rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ gdugs gcig pas kyang gcig bzang ba'o// rin po che'i gdugs nang gi phung du gling kha'i khebs so// ba dan nang gi chung du yang rgya mtsho bzhi 'khor to//
rgyal mtshan nang gi dma' ba dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnam la reg ste/ rlung gis bskyod na sgra skad snyan pa 'byin pa dang/ zhal zas phul du byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs bshams nas/ bcom
ldan 'das gang na bar lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
cag la thugs brtse b.lislad du/ mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shigaces gsol to// de bzhin gaM shegs pa dus mkhyen pas byang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo// de nas lha rnams kyang bsams/
pa bzhin du ma gyur pas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de la gcig ma gtogs pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo ste/ tshangs pa'i 'os kyi lha rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to/
de'i tshe tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od kyis gling bzhi kun snang bar byas nas/ 'dod pa'i khams na lha dang/ ma dang/ nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi snang bar byas so// de
dag kyang so so nas rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ gdugs thogs pa ni/ ba dananang gi thung du yang tshangs pa'i gnam nas shing sa la'i tshul la thug pa thogs nas/ sangs rgyas gang
na bar lhags te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/
bdag cag gi mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bas bzhes su ma gnang ngo// tshangs pa'i lha rnams bsams pa bzhin/
du mgyur nas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe lta ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzas rigs kyang lta ma yin kyi 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas
lhags so// de rnams kyi lus kyi 'od kyang tshangs pa'i lhakhas lhag par gyur te/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ gdugs rnams thogs te/ gdugs nang gi chung du yang
stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang/ phul du byung ba'i zhal zas mchog rnams thogs nas/ sangs rgyus gang na bar lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos
phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dras bdag drug la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shigaces gsol to/
de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung par bzhes su ma gnang nas/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur bas/ mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te
phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe 'dod pa khams kyi bdud kyi rgyal po bdud sdig to can yang 'khor lha'i bu mo grangs med dpag tu med pa dang bcas te/ soms can
dmal ba'i sgo phye nas yongs su bsil zhing dag pa'i chu phab ste/ de dag la 'di skad ces bsgo'o// khyod la sogs pa gzhan ci yang mi nus kyis/ sems rtse gcig tu de
bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran par gyis la/ mchod pa byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba gyis shig dang/ khyod yun ring por rab tu bde
bar 'gyura'o// de nas bdud sdig can sems can dmyawagA'i mtshon chadang/ sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba ma rab tu 'bar ba yang bsal ba'i char gyis zhi bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas
kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang 'di snyam du sems bskyed par gyur to// thams cad kyis ral gri dang/ mda' gzhu dang/ go myadang mtshon shag ti dang
lcags kyu dang/ lcags tho dang/ dgra sta dang/ 'khor lo dang/ zhags pa la sogs te/ mchon chathams cad spangs nas/ mchod pa'i yo byad lha dang mi las khyad par du
bshams so// gdugs nang gi chung du yang stong 'bring po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa thogs nas/ sas rgyas gang na bar lhags to 1 bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi
bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang theg pa chen po la rab tu dad cing mos te theg pa chen po bsrung bar
'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig khe dang grags pa'i phyir ram/ gzhan yang skrag par bya ba'i phyir ram/ gzhan la brdzu na bya ba'i phyir
ram nor dang thong zing gi phyir ram/ gzhan gyi yid dang sbyor ba tsam gyi phyir theg pa chen po 'di 'dzin par byed na/ bden yang rung/ brdzun yang rung/ bdag cag gis de 'tsho gang
zag de'i 'jigs pa bsal ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di 'bul lo/ datsug kya ta la skyog kye/ lepA le/ ma hAl pAle/ a la tsa la ta la smA/ sngags 'dis ni sems stor ba/
rnams dang/ 'jigs skrag pa dang/ chos smra ba dang/ yang dag pa'i chos kyi bar du mi gcod pa dang/ mu stags can gdul ba dang/ bdag gi lus bsrung ba dang/ yang dag pa'i chos
bsrung ba dang/ theg pa chen po bsrung ba'i slad du gsang sngags 'di 'bul lo// gang gis gsang sngags 'di yid la bgyis na/ bal gla ngag pas 'jigs pa dang bralabar 'gyur/
gal te 'brog dgon pa'i m/ yul sa stong pa pag tsha ba'i gnas su mchis na yang 'jigs par ma 'gyur/ chu dang/ ma dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang spyang ki dang/ das 'jigs pa dang/
rgyal bo'i chad pas 'jigs pa las kyang thar pa 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang bas gsang sngags la yid la bgyid na/ 'jigs pa de dag la sogs pa thams cad dang bral bar
'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'angs gsang sngags 'di 'dzin pa la/ bdag cag gis skyabs cing sba ban/ ji ltar rus sbal yan lag drug sbed pa bzhin no// bcom ldan
da'adas bdag cag ni g.yo dang spyas rang skad du smra ba ma lags kyi/ gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin pa la/ bdag cag gis mthu stobs btang ngo// bcom ldan
'das bdag cag la thugs brtsa ba'i slad du/ mchod pa bla ma 'di bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdud sdig to can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed kyis
mchod pa zhal zas su phul ba rnams ni mi bzhes so// 'gro ba thams cad dang/ 'khor rnam bzhi la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di bzhes so zhes bka' stsal nas//
cang mi gsung bar gzhan ni bzhes su ma gnang ngo// de ltar lan gsum gyi bar du gsol kyang bzhes su ma gnang nas/ bdud sdig to can bsam pa bzhin ma gyur nas/ mya ngan gyis
yid gdungs te phyogs gcige tshu 'khod do// de'i tshe lha dbang sgyur chen po rang 'khor lha 'dA lad dpag tu med pa dang bcas te/ mchod pa'i yo byad bshams par ng/
tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po bzhi dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin sde brgyad dang/ mi ma yin pa la sogs bas mchod pa'i yo byad rnams zil gyis
non pa ni/ ji ltar sol ba'i drung na shel bzhu ga pa dang 'adzrasta/ thams cad mi snang bar gyur to// rin po che'i gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang stong gsum phyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams
sa yongs su khebs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa thogs te/ sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te lan grangs med par bskor nas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mchod ba'i yo byad nang ga ze ma 'di 'bul ba ni/ji ltar bdag cag la sbrang bus mchod pa 'bul ba
'am chu snyim pa gang rgyu mtsho chen por blugs par rag/ ma mar chung du ma gcig gi 'od kyis nyi ma brgya stong la btang ba las/ dbyar ma tog shin tu rgyas pa'i dus su ma tog gcig
btogs te/ ma tog mang po'i khrod du bzhag pa lam 1 yungs kar 'brum bu gnyis tsam po'ab ri'i rgyal po la btang na/ rgya mtsho dang/ nya ma dang/ me tog mang po dang ri rab
la mi snyan pa dang 'dra bar/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi mchod pa'i ng de dang 'dra'o// gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sos dang/ ma tog dang/
rol mo dang/ ba danadang 2 gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su bkang ste mchod kyang smos pa'i rten du mi 'tshal lo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'gro ba
mang po'i slad du/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ byol song gi skye gnas su sdug bsngal mang po len to// de bas na bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtsa ba'i
slad du/ mchod pa 'di dag bzhes shig ces gsol to// de'i 'di nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams klung gang+ga'i bye ma grangs mang dpag tu ]
med pa 'dus pa'i pha rol sangs rgyas kyi zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgrasnyan zhes bya ba na/ sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten rig pa// bla na med pa// skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sas rgyas bcom ldan
'das bzhugs te/ de'i tshon sangs rgyas des/ nye gnas chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'gas kyi bu khyod song la 'di nas nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces
bya ba na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
rig pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyu rab/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ring por mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'drar nye'o// rigs
kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i zhal zas bsubatsan dri shin tu zha/ yid du 'ong zhing bde bar ragyur ba 'di thogs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la phul cig/ bcom ldan
'das de gsol nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs so// rigs kyi bu khyod de la phyag 'tshal zhing the tsom du gyur par nga zhu ba'i dus la bab po/ de nas byung chub sems dpar
sams dpa' chen po lus dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'dug pa las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyug rAtshal te lan gsum bskor nas byang chub sems dpa' grangs
smad dpag med pa dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bar dong ngo// de'i tshon stong gsum gyi stong chen po' rajig rten gyi khams rnam
pa drug tu g.yos nas/ 'khor gyi nang na tshangs pa dang 2 brgya byin dang/ phyogs bzhi'i mgon po dang/ bdud sdig to can dang/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa de dag gis sa
g.yos pa mthong nas lus skye phung zhes byed de/ lce'ang bskams pa tsam du sngangs skrag par gyur te/ so so'i 'gro bar chas nas/ lus kyi 'od dang gzi brjid kyang mi snang ba'
gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug pa las langs te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag khyad
'jigs par ma byed cig/ khyed la 'jigs shig/ de ba'i phyir zhe na/ 'di nas shar phyogs na 'jig rten kyi khams klung gang+gA bye ma grongs med dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i tha
dal na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid du 'ong ba'isgra snyazhes bya ba na/ sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan bcu dang ldan pa bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu mad pa zhes bya ba/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dang bcas te/
'jig rten gyi khams 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod du 'ong bas/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i gzi brjid dang byin gyis khyed kyi lus kyi 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ de bas na
khyed la 'jigs pa shin tu dga' ba skyed cig/ de'i tshe nada' khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyis rgyang ma nasasangs rgyas de dang 'khor mang po'i rnams mthong ba ni/ driltar ma long gsal
ba'i nang na bdag gis gablugs bstan mthong ba bzhin no// de nas yang rajam dpal gyis/ 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed kyis sangs rgyas de mthong ba ni/ ji lta
wA sangs rgyas rad mthong ba dang 'dra bar 1 sas rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas phyogs dag na bzhugs pa dpag tu med pa snyad kyang mthong bar gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor mang pos gcig la gcig 'di skad du 1 kyi hud kyicud 'jig rten stongs so// 'jig rten stongs so// de bzhin gshags pa 'ang por mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las
'da' 'o zhes sas so// de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang bo thams cad kyis/ byang chub sams dbar lus dpag tu med pa 'khor dang bcas pa mthong pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub

sams dpa' de'i ba spu'i khung bu re re nas ma rtog paro chen po re re byung la/ pad+mo de re re'i stang yang grong khyer bdun khri brgyad stong snyad yod do// grong khyer dang chu zheng gab pa'i grong khyer yas
can dang mnyam/ ra ba dang 'obs kyang rin po che sna bdun gyis spras la/ 'an po che'i shing rta la 'am pa bdun dang ra ba/ de na gnas pa'i ma thams cad kyang 'ab tu bde zhing skyid pa//
grong khyer de chog par yang ra dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa/ chog pa' de re re'i bar na rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rnam pa sna tshogs yod do// ma tog dang 'bras bu shin tu rgyas
ba rlung gi ma drag pas skyod pa na sgra skad shin tu snyan ba ni/ ji ltar lha'i 'ol mo zer ba lta bu de na gnas pa'i ma dag gis thos na/ phul du byung ba'i 'ab tu bde ba myong bar 'gyur 'o//
'obs kyi nang na'ang yongs su dag pa'i chub sung can pany+tsamadang 'dra bas yongs su gang ngo// chu de dag la rin po che sna bdun gyi gru yod do/ dgru de'i stang na mi dag rtsa zhing khrus byed de/
gcig la gcig dga' zhing 'ang tu bde ba myong ngo// gzhan yang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi pad+mo skye ba ni ut+pal dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+mo dang/ pun da ra ka la sogs pa shing rta'i
'khor lotsal skya'o// 'obs kyi g.yas g.yon na skyed mos la nyang du yod de/ skyed mos tshal de re re'i nang du'ang chu mig dang bcas pa'i rdzing bu lnga lnga yod
rdzing bu de dag gi nang na'ang me tog sa=la dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dang/ pan da ra ka rma khyad shing rta'i 'khor lo rtsam skya ste/ dri bsung din tu dadad pa/ rab tu yid du 'ong pa
chung ngu [sj]la zhing ra[E]sa pa ngang pa dang dul la zhing rtse ba/ skyed mos tshal de na gzhan yang rin po che'i gzhal med khang yod de/ gzhang khang re re'ang chu zheng gab par dpaka
tshadab// 7ga dpA Na na pa de[- , , ,]sa ngan pas byas so/[v]las gsar dang dngul dang/ paM ltaglu nga/ ga/ pa bad kyang gas las
byas sa zhe na mu sa smad d+hA kA las bangs ti gsar gyi bye ma bdal ba// nal ma khang de'i drung na 'in po che sna bdun gyi 'bab chu dang// ljang bu yod de/ ring bu
re re la'ang gsar gyi thang ma skas bco brgyad yod do//chu shing yang 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar las byas te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi skyang mosAtsAkaTa'ab tu bde ba can dang 'dra'o// grong
byard le'i nang na'ang rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong pa yod do// rgyal po de se ra tsa'ang btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas grangs med par yod do/ de nga rtsed rtse zhing dga' rtse/ da na gnas
pa'i mi thams cad kyang so so'i gnas na rtsa zhing dgar ro// da na konas pa'i sems can rnams ni rna bar gzhan ma grag gi/ bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i sgra 'ba' zhig grag go/ ma rtog de ste
'i nang na'ang seng ge 'i khri re re yod de/ khri de'i nang pa bzha'ang po zlum+ma mthon mthing las byas pa/ khams gsum las 'das pa'i na bza' shin tu 'jam pa dkar pos btang ngo// da de
re re'i steng na rgyal po de re re 'dug ste/ theg pa chen por chos kyis sems can rnams 'dul te/ de la'ang sems can la la ni theg pa chen po'i mdo sde glegs bam du 'dri ba dang 'chang
ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ ji ltar smras pa bzhin du nan tan du byed pa dang/ shin tu rgyas pa'i bar du byed do// de'i tshon byang chub sems dpar lus dpag tu
mad pa des/ bdag gi lus la sems can tshad med pasnyad bkod pa'ong 'jig rten gyi bde ba btang nas thams cad 'di skad du/ dkyi rgyud kyi chung 'jig rten stongs so// de ba'i gshegs
pa 'ang po mawen bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' no zhes smras so// de'i byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tumad pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshad med pa snyad kyis bskor te da lta pu'i
'phrul mngon par bstan+danas/ mchod pa'i yo byad tshad med pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ zhal bras pasung can thogs te/ gang zhig la zhal thas de'i bsung gis reg na kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
spya// dri ma thams cad zhi ba 'a gyur ro// byang chub sams dpa' de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ 'kho ra gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad skyu raphrul de dag mthong par gyur to// byang
chub sems dpa'i lus dpag tu med pa ni/ lus chen po dpag tu med pa de nam mkha' dang mnyam pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs par/ gzhan gang yang byung chub
sems dpa' de'i lus kyi mtha' shes par nus pa med do// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa 'khor dang bcas pas mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma bas lhag par bshams te/
sangs rgyus gang na bar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar te bsti stang dang pacas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to
bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ mchod pa 'di dag bzhes shig ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas sbyang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang/
nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus dpag tu med pa 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang byang phung sangs rgyas kyu zhang kun nas/ byung
chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa grangs med pa snyad kyang/ mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma nga sa lhag par bshams nas/ sangs rgyas gang na pa ka sa pa nas/ phyogs gcig+hA tu/
'khod pa'i bar du rgyus par rig par bya'o/ 'de'i shing sa la drang gnyis kyi bar bsod nams kyi sa gzhi bkra shas kyi gnas der/ kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad sum cu rtsa
gnyis kyi bar 'khor kyi dkyil 'kher gyis sa stong cung zad kyang mad bar yongs su gang ngo// de'i tshe phyogs bzhi nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas te 'dug pa'i gnas
ni skyang ga rtse mo 'am/ khab kyi rtse mo tsam mam/ rdul phra mo tsam mo// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab snyad kyi sangs rgyas kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
kyang 'dus par gyur/ 'dzam bu'i glang na gnas pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang 'dus par gyur to/ de la gnyis ma gtogs pa ni/ 'od srungs chen po dang dga' bo'i// rgyal po ma skyes
dgrwa 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ sprul gdug pa ltas pa tsam gyis ramib byed pa dang/ sbyar pa dang/ sdig pa'i bar du sdeg ba can gyi las spyod pa rnam pa bcu drug po ma togs pa gzhan
thams cad 'dus par gyurato// srin po da na pa dang/ lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad kyang sdig pa'i bsam pa btang nas/ gcagi la gcig byams shing sdug pa'i sams bskyad pa ni
pha lom/ ma 'am/ na lta bur gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i soms skyid de/
gcig ma gtogs pa ni leg sred can no// de'i tshe stong kasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams kyang sangs rtsa ras kyi pa sa sa[0f10 ]/ mas nga
kyang 'jam par gyur/ ngam grog dang/ bye ma dang/ gsog ma dang rdo ba dang/ shing tsher ma can dang cu gdug pa'i ng med par gyur/ na pa nga rnams pa' snatsa shAn
brgyan pa ni/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyus tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dang 'dra ba' gyur to// de'i 'a khor gyi dkyil pa sa phams cad kyis/ phyogs
bcu 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra mo snyad shin tu snang ba ni/ ji ltar la deng gsal ba'i nang na bdag ki kazugs brnyan snang ba bzhin no// nas de bzhin gshekas pa/ lo sa/
gyi sgo nas 'od rnam pa lnga byung ste/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po snang bar byas nas/ de dag gi lus kyi 'od sder mi mngon par thal gyis man sa nas phra tA ba kyi skye[– ]las sa//
de'i tshe lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ sas rgyas kyi 'od zer phyir yang zhal gyi sgor zhugs pa mthong na khyad 'jigs skrag ste/ lus kyi ba
sbya kun kyang la ngas nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bskye nas slar zhugs pa 'di ni rgyu mad pa 'am/ skyon ma nga 4/ ma'// phyogs bcur mdzad pa kun/
mdzad nas/ tha ma yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ltas yin du nges so// kyicud kyi cud de bzhin gshegs pas tshad med pa bzhi'i thugs btang nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod
pa'i ng bzhes su ma gnang ngo// dang sun chad ni ye shes kyi nyimarang nub par gyur/ bla na med pa'i tshogs kyi grurang bying bar gyur to// kyi hud re sdug 'jig rten sdug bsngal chen pos gdungs
par gyur to zhes smras nas/ brang la kha tshur gyis rdeg cing cho nge 'don pas lus kyis mi bzod pa tsam du shin tu 'dar te/ ba spu'i khung kun nas khrag kyang thag par gyur to//
bam po gnyis pa/// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na/ grong khyer rtswa mchog gi shing mkhan gyi bu dag bstan btsun da zhes bya ba/ ris mthun pa'i
la khor lnga bcu dang lhan cig tu 'dus so// des 'jig rten du bcas pa dag dag pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir sngon gyi tshul btang nas 'dug pa las langs te/ bla gos phyogs
gcig tu byas 2 pus mo g.yas pa lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga na ba logs su thal mo sbyar/ mchim blags te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag
'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas/ bdag cag gi mchod pa tha ma 'di bzhes su gsol/
bya// de'ang sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bsgral ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni deng sun tshad ma u0f7cna ma sa ngas/ skyabs ma mchis dpang
zla gnyen ma mchis/ rten ma mchis/ gnas ma mchis te/ shin tu dbul 'phongs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa las su ma mchis pa'i dus skyo tsam zhig gsol 'de ba tse na
ldan 'das thugs brtse ba'i sad du/ bdag cag gi mchod pa tha ma 'di bzhes nas/ gdod yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dpar na rgyal/
rigs sam/ bram ze 'am/ gdol pa'i ng rung/ dbul 'phongs pas yul gzhan du mchis te/ zhing gi las la zhugs nas nang dul ba dang/ zhing yang ga shin las gzhi
mnyam pa dang/ gsog ma dang/ zhing gi ngo yul ma mchis na/ dgung char 'ba' zhig la se'o/ dpacom ldan 'das chon pa dul ba 9 pa kyi pa ra/ lus dang ngag ka las
bdun po'i dpa'o// zhang ga shin la sa gzhi mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ shes rab kyi dpa'o/ dgag ma dang zhung gi ngo yu'i ma mchis zhes bgyi bani/ nyon mongs pa'i dpal//
bcom ldan 'das bdag la'ang rmod pa dul ba dang/ zhing gshin pa'i ng mchis la/ zhing gi ngo yur ma sa la na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi cha ra 'ba' zhig la
'o rigs dbul po bzhi ni bdag lags te/ bdag ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi rin po ches dbul te 'phongs na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag ga dbul 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal
bsal zhing/ sdug bsngal gyis yong su gdungs pasems can tshad ma mchis pa bsgral du gsol/ bdag cag gi mchod pa 'di shin tu chung mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor
mang po kun gyi bsod snyoms su 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la mgon ma mchis/ skyabs ma mchis/ dpung gnyen ma mchis na/ sgra gcan 'dzin lta bur thugs brtse bar
dgongs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul zhing kha la sbyar bas/ tsun nga la 'di skad ces bkalasul to/ dalegs
so legs so// ngas khyod kyi dbul 'phongs pa med ba dang/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi char khyod kyi lus la dbab cing/ chos kyi myu gu skye bar bya'o// khyod ni da lta'atshe dang/ mdog dang/
stobs dang/ bad ba dang/ thogs pa med pa'i so sor yang dag par shes pa thob par 'dod de/ sa khyod la tshe dang mdog dang stobs dang/ bde ba dang/ thog pa med pa'i so sor
yang dag par shes pa rtag tu sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tsun da bras kyi sbyin pa byin pas/ khyad par mang ba'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis thob par 'gyur ro// gnyis gang zhe na/ bzhes
'bya// chos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa dang da bzhes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'o// ngas kyang khyed kyi chod pa nang gi thal
bzhes pas/ khyod kyi sbyin pa'i pha 'ol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te// de nas tsan das/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa ltas sbyin pa byin pa 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis khyad par ma mchis so// zhes bgyi ba de ma lags so// de nyi'i slad du zhe na/ snga ma pa bzhes pa ni nyon mongs pa'i ng yang
bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang rdzogs par ma gyur/ sems can gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bgyid pa'i ng ma lags so// sbyin pa byin pa sud kyis bzhes pa/
nyon mongs pa'i ng bas par gyural/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su rdzogs shing/ sems can gyi sbyin pa'i bcol tu phyin pa'i ng yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags so/
spen pa sngar blangs pa ni sems can no// sbyin pa phyis bzhes pa ni lha'i lta'o// sbyin pa sngar blangs pa ni zas dang 'dres pa'i lus/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i lus/ thams cad kyi
lus la rtag pa'i lus so// sbyin pa phyis bzhes pa na nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i sku/ rdo rje lta bu'i ngos kyi sku/ rtag pa'i sku/ mtha' yas pa'i sku lags na/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa rnam
ba gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par ma mas zhes gsungs/ sngar sbyin pa phyungs ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du
rdzogs par mi 'gyur te sha'i mig 'ba' zhig thob kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan ma thob pa nas/ shes rab kyi spyan gyi bar du thob pa ma lags so// sbyin pa phyis bzhes pa ni sbyin pa 'i
pha thol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs la/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan pas na/ shes rab kyi spyan gyi bar du ldan pa
lags na/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par ma mchis zhes gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa sngar blangs pa ni blangs ma thag tu 'tshal nas/ de ma thag tu
khu pas tshe dang/ mdog dang/ stobs dang/ bde ba dang/ so sor yang dag par shes pa thob pa lags so// sbyin pa phyis bzhes pa ni gsol ba dang zhu ba'ang ma mchis la/ 'bras
ba rnam pa lnga po'ang ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du spyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par ma mchis zhes gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni bskal pa tshad med mtha' yas grangs med pa'i bar du/ zas tsam nyon mos pa dang bcas pa'i sku ma yin/ nang tha ma'i sku ma yin te/ rtag pa'i sku/
chos kyi sku/ rdo rje'askul/ rigs kyi pa sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ma mthong pa ni nyon mongs 4 li lus/ yus dang pa/ 0 ra wa/ kyang
chub sems dpa' de'i tshe bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bsod snyoms zhu la khag tu sangs rgyas kyi [1 ] sbyong [} ]kun mud pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas to/ de bas na sbyin pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par med do zhes ngas gsungs so// phyi pa sa nga khyod la rang bdud bzhi bcom
la da mya ngan las 'da' khar yang bdud rnam bzhi bcom pas/ de bas na sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par mad do zhes ngas gsungs so// ya la sems la ngelI ts+tshin mdo sde/
bcu gnyis rgyas pa la gsungs mod kyi/ thams cad snga phrugs su chud la mya ngan las 'das kazasems can rnams la rgyas par bya zhing ngastabs/ do ba spren pa rnam pa gnyis
la khyad par med do// the gas kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du bsod snyoms ma gsol mdake/ skad ces gsungs//
sngon de bzhin gshegs pas la gnag pa u0f7a mo nan ta dang nan ta pa la gnyis kyis 'o ma'i 'jam phul ba bzhes nas/ gded bla na med pa yang sa pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
rdzogs pa sangs rgyas so// nga ni yang dag par bashes ma gsol te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po 'ad dag gi phyir/ khyod kyi mchod pa tha ma 'di bzhes mod kyi/ yang dag pa na
gsol ba mad do/ de'i tshon 'khor bya dkyil 'khor de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tsun da'i mchod pa bzhes pa mthong nas thams cad dga' mgu rangs te/ skado mthun
bas tsun da la legs so// shin tu legs so zhes smras so// khyod kyi ming btags pa thog tu bab bo/ datsun da zhes bya ba ni den dam pa la mkhas pa ste khyod kyis kyang deng 'dir don/
chen po brtsams pas/ de bas na don las ming tsun da zhes btags te/ khyod kyis ni tshe 'di nyid la grags pa dang phan pa'i don chen po 'thob cing/ smon pa'i ng yongs su rdzogs par gyur te ngo
mtshub skye'o// tsun du mi'i nang du skyes kyang bla na med pa'i bde ba shin tu rnyed dka' ba thob bo// legs so// tsun dam tog u dum blo blta 'jig rten na shin tu dkon pa lta/ sangs
rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs ba yang shin tu rnyed dka' la/ sangs rgyas dang phrad nas dad pa skyid po yang shin tu dka' chos thos pa yang shin tu dka'/ sangs rgyas yongs su mya
ngan las 'das kar mchod pa bshams te phul ba shin tu dka'o// tsun da la phyag 'tshal// khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rtol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs te/ ston gyi tshes bzo lnga'i zla ba
ltar rgyas shing yongs su dag la sprin nam na bun gyis ma chod na/ thams cad kyis blta ba dang 'dra bar/ khyod kyang de dang 'dra bar bdag cag la sogs pas shin/
cu lta bar gyur to// khyod kyi mchod pa nang gi tha ma bzhes pas/ khyod kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ tsunang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bas ma khyod ni
zla ba yongs su rgyas pa dang 'dra ste/ sems can thams cad gang yang selta ba med do/ datsun da khyod phyag 'tshal lo// mi'i lus thob kyang sems sangs rgyas kyi thugs dang
'dra bas// tsun da khyod na sangs rgyas kyi sras yang dag pa ste/ sgra gcan 'dzin dang tha mi dad do/ de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de
smras pa/ mi yi nang du khyod skyes pa// drug po lha las shin tu 'phags// bdag cag 'khor rnams thams cad kyis// khyod la phyag 'tshal gsol ba 'debs// mi yi
skyes bu khyu mchog ni// yongs su mya ngan 'da' zhes gsungs// bdag cag rnams la snying brtse phyir// sangs rgyas bzhugs par gsol ba thob// yun du 'jig rten 'dir bzhugs
shing [;]tshad mad 'khor la phan pa'i phyir// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yi// bla mad chos mchog bshad du gsol// khyod kyis gsol ba ma btab na// bdag ga
rnams ni mi 'tsho'o// de bas khyod kyis gsol ba thob// kha lo sgyur ba'i ston pa la// de'i tshe tsun da shin tu dga' mgu rangs pa ni/ dper na mi zhig pha ma shi ba las
phyis sos pa tsam du tsun da'ang shin tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// legs so bde ba'i don
du gyur// mi yi lus kyang legs par thob// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug bsal// ngan song gsum yang yongs su spangs// legs so bde ba'i don gyur te// rin chen gser
gyi ri mthong nas// ston pa kha lo sgyu dang mjal/ byol song khams su skye mi dogs// sangs rgyas u dum wa ra ltar// phrad pa'i dus kyang shin tu dka'// phrad nas ngag
ba'i rtsa pa'i ng bskyad// yi dgis sdug bsngal yongs su bcom// gzhan yang yongs su bcom pa ni// lha ma yin gyi ris rnams te// khab rtsis yungs kar bzod pa bas//
sangs rgyas 'byung ba de bas dka'// bdag ni sbyin pa yongs rdzogs te/ lha dang ma yi rgyud las tha'/ 'jig rtan chos kyis ma gos pa// pad+mo'i chus mi chags bzhin te//
srid pa bar du legs par spangs// 'khor ba'i rgyun las yongs su grol// ma yi lus thob shin tu dka'// sangs rgyas 'byung dang phrad par dka'// ji ltar rgya mtsho/
chen po'i nang// rus sbal long ba 'byung ba de// shing gi bu gar mgo chud bzhin// sas rgyas 'byung ba de bas dka'// bdag gis mchod pa gsol/
ba 'di// bla med 'bras bu thob par smon// kun nas nyon mongs thams cad na// snying po med pas thams cad bcom/ bdag ni da ltar 'di nyid na// lha dang mi yi lus yi/
ra ci sta thob par gyur na yang// de la dga' ba mos pa yod// bcom ldan bdag gi mchod bzhes pas// shin tu dga' ba dpag ma mchis/ 'aa ran da yi me tog la
tsan dan bzang po'i dri 'byung bzhin// bdag ni a ran 'dra ba ste// bcom ldan bdag ga mchod bzhes pas// tsan dan bzang po bsung mngad bzhin// de bas bdag ni shin tu
dga'// bdag ni 'bras bu mngon du thob// bla med mchog gi gnas phyin te// tshangs pa brgya byin lha rnams kyang// lhags nas bdag la mchod pa bgyid// 'jig rten
bcas pa thams cad ni// sdug bsngal chen po'i mya ngan skyes// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa/ 3yongs su mya ngan 'da' zhes rtogs// thams cad mthun pa
skad chen pos// 'jig rten kha lo sgyur ba med// sems can thams cad mi spang zhing/ sras dang 'dra bar gzigs su gsol// bcom ldan dge 'dun 'khor rnams la//
bla na med pa'i chos ston pa/// ji ltar rgya mtsho che yi dbus// rin chen ri rab snang ba bzhin// bcom ldan ye shes yongs gcodapa// ma rig pa yi mun pa sta// ji lta
nam mkha'i bar snang la/ sprin chod yongs su bsal ba bzhin// bcom ldan yongs su sal ba ni// kun nas nyon mongs thams cad de// ji ltar nyi ma shar nas su//
sprin med kun tu snang ba bzhin// da lta sems can 'di dag ni// shin tu du bas mig kyang skrangs// thams cad 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sdug bsngal 'bab klung g.yeng/
par gyur// de bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba'i dad pa skyed pa dang// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gcad pa'i phyir// 'jig rten yun du bzhugs par gsol/
pa dbcom ldan 'das kyis tsun du la bka' stsal ba/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis smras pa bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du
gshegs pa shin tu dka' ba ni/ ma tog u dum wa ra dang 'dra ba'o// sangs rgyas dang phrad nus dad pa skya ba'ang de bas shin tu dkala'o// sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das
kar mchod pa phul bas bzhes te/ sbyin pa'i po rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i ng de bas shin tu dka' ste/ tsun da khyod mya ngan ma byed par shin tu dga' bas bdag sprob
skyad cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas mchod pa nang gi tha ma bzhes te da sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas rmug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la
'jig rten na yun du bzhugs par gsol ba ma 'debs shig khyod kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul thams cad mi rtag la/ 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang de'i tshul du rig pa
gyis shig/ de nas tsun da la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten bcas pa thams cad ni// skye ba yod na 'chib yod// tshel grangs med thub pa yang//
ba ma zad par rig par bya// dar ba yod na rgud pa yod// 'du ba yod na 'bral bar 'gyur// lang tsho de yang mi rtag sta/ darab 'i mdog kyang nad kyis 'phrog/ 'askyo ba'i tsho yang
'chi bas 'phrog/ rtag pa'i chos ni gang yang med// dbang du gyur pa'i rgyal po dag/ byin dang mthu stobs zla mod kyang// thams cad 'gyur zhing 'pho bas na/ ]'tsho ba'i srog
lta kyang de bzhin no// sdug bsngal 'khor la mtha' med do// 'khor bar 'khor ba rgyan ma 'chad// khams gsum thams cad rtag pa med// srid pa thams cad bde ma yin//
tshosrid pa'i mtshan nyid dngos pon// thams cad stong pa med pa ste// 'jig pa'i chos can 'gyur zhing 'bo// mya ngan skyon dang rtag tu bcas// skyon mang 'jig pa'i tshes can te//
rga dang na 'chis rtag tu gtsos// srid pa'i chos ni mtha' yas pas// 'gyur zhing 'pho ba'i dgra dang bcas// nyon mongs kun tu glags pa ni// ji ltar dar gyi srin bu bzhin// de la
mkhas pa shes rab can// su zhig dga' zhing mos par byed// lus 'di sdug bsngal phung po ste// thams cad mi gtsang btsog pa'o// skyon gyis btsangs shing cha dang ldan/ phan
pa'i don ni mi nas mad// bar na lha yi lus bar du// thams cad de dang 'drabs na// 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag pas// nga ni de la chags mi byed// 'dod stangs legs par
yid byas nas// yang dag bden pa rig par 'gyur// srid pa yongs su gcod ba na// deng 'dir yongs su mya ngan 'da'/ nga ni srid pa'i pha rol phyin// sdug bsngal kun las
shin tu 'das// de bas da ltar thob pa ni// bla med bde ba 'ba' zhig go/ de yi rgyu dang rkyen gyis na// spros pa med pa'i mtha' rig ste// bcing ba thams cad yongasaM bcad nas// deng
'dir yongs su mya ngan 'dar// nga la ga nAb med// sku tshe'i tshad kyang zad mi shes/ gdong du mya ngan 'das pa ni// ji ltar ma chen shu ba bzhin// tsun da khyod ni ma rtog cig/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i don rnams la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di// ba'ib bzhin du brtag bar bya// nga ni mya ngan 'das zhugs te// mchog gi bde ba myong bar 'gyur//
sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid yin// de bas du bar mi bya'o// de nas tsun das/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de de bzhin no//
de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba bzhin te bdag 'tshal ba'i shes rab shin tu chung ba na// dbor na sbrang bu dang 'dra bas// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su
mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa'i don zab mo dag la rig/ bcom ldan 'dasabadag ni kru chen po dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas nyon mongs pa dang srog
ba thams cad bas ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa dang mnyam par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dpar nagasar du rab tu byung ba bstun bar ma rdzogs mod kyi/ dge 'dun
gyi gras su mchib dang 'dra bar/ bdagakyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de ltar byang chub sems dab chen po de dag gi grangs su gtogs pa
gyur te/ de bas na bdag na de bzhin gshegs pa kun du 'jig rten na bzhugs shing mya ngan las ma 'da' bar gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das dper na mi bkres pa de mis+sarasmon mi gda' ste/
bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang de dang 'dra na mya ngan las mi 'da' bar 'jig rtenan yun du bzhugs bar gsol lo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tsun pa la 'di
skad ces smras so/ tsun da khyod 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na yun du bzhugs shing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsolab/ ji ltar mi shin tu bkres pa de spyag bro mi
srid do zhes de skad ma zer bar/ khyod 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu rtogs shig/ de ltar 'du byed la brtags na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par gyur gyis/ yang dag pa'i
chos 'dod pa dag de lta bu'i tshul du bslab par bya'o// tsun das/ 'jam dpal la smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba na lha dang mi'i nang na mchog tu gyur/ phul du gyur na//
ci de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed lags sam/ ci lta 'du byed lags na/ skya zhing 'gag pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ dpar na chu'i chu bur ltar/ de ma thag tu 'byung la/ de ma thag tu/
'jig ste/ 'khor bar khor ba ni shing rta'i 'khor lo dang mtshungs te/ 'du byed thams cad kyang de dang mtshungs so// bdag gi sngon thos pa ltar na lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyang shin tu bang
